uninstall.readme:
This will Uninstall the Custom Form Mod by LHVWB and Garou
Warning!!! This Uninstall process will Remove ALL DATA associated with the forms and fields from this Mod, if you want to keep them then we suggest that you make a backup of these three MySQL tables: '{db_prefix}cf_fields', '{db_prefix}cf_forms' and '{db_prefix}permissions'.
